summary: The contact owns a 2019 Lance Camper. The contact stated that there was a natural gas odor coming from the stove after use. The contact received a notification for NHTSA Campaign Number: 20E071000 (Equipment) however, the part for the recall repair was unavailable. Several unknown dealers had been notified about the issue however, the contact was informed that the parts were not yet available. The manufacturer was made aware of the issue. The contact stated that the manufacturer had exceeded a reasonable amount of time for the repair. The failure mileage was approximately 5,000. Parts distribution disconnect.
